text: dawis-i malhagil geuga neoege dan hanmali ppun-in neoui yang-eul geuui yangttelo dula yoguhan geos-eun bunmyeonghan jalmos-ila sillo manh-eun dong-eobjadeul-i seolo-ege jalmos hanani igeos-eun mid eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghaneun ideulkwa gatji anhnola geuleona geudeul-eun sosula daoes-eun hananimkkeseo geuleul siheomham-eul-algo junimkke buboghayeo yongseoleul gu hago hoegaehayeo hananimkkelo gwiuihayeossdeola
